articles.title: Air Nostrum, CityJet Revive Merger Plan - Aviation Week
articles.description: Spain’s Air Nostrum and Irish wet-lease operator CityJet are understood to be reapplying for merger approval from the European Commission.
articles.content:
Air Nostrum, CityJet Revive Merger Plan is published in Aviation Daily, an Aviation Week Intelligence Network (AWIN) Market Briefing and is included with your AWIN membership.
